Hydras::

"Yes, yes... You can..."Hydras said with a thoughtful tone"If only I 
find the way to introduce you to Maximals... In that way that they 
don't suspect of you... But How?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> 
> > Hydras leaded Maxima towas the mess hall, there was alot  chairs 
and tables 
> > around. Hydras took two glasses full of liquid energon and offer 
one to 
> > Maxima.
> 
> She followed him, then stopped beside him as he offered 
the 'drink' to her. 
> Taking the 'drink' with grace, "Most generous of you," she stated.
> 
> > 
> > He sat down in a corder, that was just for Hydras and motioned 
Maxima to 
> > saat down in one chair in the same table. Hydras dramk a abit of 
energon 
> > and 
> > said "Tripedocus and Maximals are allied but is a weak 
alliance..." But a 
> > devil smile arose in his face"But I have a plan that will let me 
have 
> > ROdimus Prime in my grasp...."
> > 
> 
> Sitting down in the chair he indicated, then taking another 
sip. "Is that 
> so?" 
> 
> She remembered the young brash youth who became the Prime. He 
annoyed her 
> sometimes, but remembered an alliance a couple times, though she 
had no 
> choice. 
> 
> "I'm very curious as to what you have in mind." Taking a 
sip. "Perhaps, I 
> can... assist." 
> 
> Watching Hydras with a curious sparkle in her optics, eager to 
know his 
> plans. If Wheeljack finished her form in a few days as he stated & 
Hydras 
> would make his assault after being restored to her previous form, 
then she 
> would be of better use to Hydras.
